evidence.claim: The company implements HIPAA compliance measures for their home care services.
Agape United Home Care emphasizes the use of secure data handling practices in alignment with healthcare regulations.
The site mentions their support for electronic health records (EHR) implementation.
Details available on the integration of health data compliance standards, although not specific to APIs.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence found that they utilize X12 transactions or are a healthcare clearinghouse.
